title: Ep. 222 Jim Cramer Unplugged
itunes:title: Jim Cramer Unplugged
description:
This week on S&A Investor Radio, Jim Cramer, host of CNBC's Mad Money and Frank's former boss, joins us to talk about his new book Get Rich Carefully.
During this special interview, Cramer tells us why the current correction will be temporary...
He also shares what to look for when buying growth stocks... You won't want to miss this! 
And find out why Apple should think twice about using its cash hoard to buy back its stock.
